policies.name: CORPORATE FINANCE ANALYST
policies.content:
INTERVIEW POLICY
PURPOSE
To assess the candidate's financial modeling skills, budgeting capabilities, analytical thinking, and business acumen for financial planning and reporting.

INTERVIEW STRUCTURE
Finance & Accounting Concepts – 25 minutes
Case Study or Modeling Round – 30 minutes
Tools & Reporting Assessment – 15 minutes
Business Acumen & Stakeholder Interaction – 10 minutes

CORE COMPETENCIES TO ASSESS
Financial planning, forecasting, and analysis (FP&A)
Budgeting and cost control
Proficiency in Excel, Power BI, SAP, or similar tools
Understanding of financial statements and ratios
Strategic business impact interpretation
Report creation for C-suite

SCENARIO-BASED ASSESSMENT
Analyzing a P&L variance
Building a quarterly forecast
Interpreting ROI on a business project
Communicating findings to non-finance leaders

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS
1–3 years in finance or related field
Bachelor's in Finance, Commerce, or Economics
Familiarity with financial models, dashboards, and business reports

RED FLAGS
Poor spreadsheet or modeling discipline
Inability to explain financial metrics clearly
Lacks business decision-making perspective

policies.name: MARKETING MANAGER
policies.content:
INTERVIEW POLICY
PURPOSE
To evaluate a candidate's ability to design and execute marketing strategies, manage campaigns, analyze performance metrics, and contribute to brand growth.

INTERVIEW STRUCTURE
Strategic Marketing Round – 25 minutes
Campaign Review Exercise – 20 minutes
Analytics & Budgeting Assessment – 15 minutes
Soft Skills & Stakeholder Communication – 15 minutes

CORE COMPETENCIES TO ASSESS
Marketing planning and execution
Digital and offline campaign knowledge
Brand management and audience targeting
Marketing analytics and ROI tracking
Budget management and media planning
Collaboration with design, product, and sales teams

SCENARIO-BASED ASSESSMENT
Developing a product launch campaign
Handling a campaign failure
Managing limited-budget promotions
Communicating with external agencies

MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS
3–5 years in a marketing role
Knowledge of tools like Google Analytics, SEMrush, Meta Ads, HubSpot
Bachelor's in Marketing/Business (MBA preferred)

RED FLAGS
Poor understanding of performance metrics
No clear campaign ownership experience
Lacks collaboration or brand alignment awareness
